item.title: HTTPS during development using 'mkcert'
item.description: It’s always a hassle creating certificates and lot of technical jargons involved. This can be simplified, using mkcert. Install by following one of the steps mentioned in the docs. Once installed just run: $ mkcert -install Created a new local CA at "/home/hummer/.local/share/mkcert" ðŸ’¥ [sudo] password for hummer: The local CA is now installed in the system trust store! âš¡ The local CA is now installed in the Firefox and/or Chrome/Chromium trust store (requires browser restart)!
